timeline.bodyText: I am not sure 100%  but this is not clusterName. It is the Kafka Connect S2I custom resource name and same with the others. Hmmm?
timeline.author: see-quick

replies.bodyText: Good question and I can change it to resourceName -> this will be better and clear.
replies.author: im-konge

replies.bodyText: hmmm kafkaConnectS2ICrName would be better and analogically for the others. ResourceName can invoke others that you can use there any type of resource not specifically the KafkaConnectS2I in this case.
replies.author: see-quick
